name: BEDPOSTX5
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: BEDPOSTX5, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: BEDPOSTX5).

inputs.name: All ard
inputs.description: A boolean. Turn ard on on all fibres.

inputs.name: Burn in
inputs.description: A long integer >= 0. Total num of jumps at start of mcmc to be discarded.

inputs.name: Burn in no ard
inputs.description: A long integer >= 0. Num of burnin jumps before the ard is imposed.

inputs.name: Bvals
inputs.description: An existing file name. B values file.

inputs.name: Bvecs
inputs.description: An existing file name. B vectors file.

inputs.name: Cnlinear
inputs.description: A boolean. Initialise with constrained nonlinear fitting.

inputs.name: Dwi
inputs.description: An existing file name. Diffusion weighted image data file.

inputs.name: F0 ard
inputs.description: A boolean. Noise floor model: add to the model an unattenuated signal compartment f0.

inputs.name: F0 noard
inputs.description: A boolean. Noise floor model: add to the model an unattenuated signal compartment f0.

inputs.name: Force dir
inputs.description: A boolean. Use the actual directory name given (do not add + to make a new directory).

inputs.name: Fudge
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Ard fudge factor.

inputs.name: Grad dev
inputs.description: An existing file name. Grad_dev file, if gradnonlin, -g is true.

inputs.name: Gradnonlin
inputs.description: A boolean. Consider gradient nonlinearities, default off.

inputs.name: Logdir
inputs.description: A directory name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Bet binary mask file.

inputs.name: Model
inputs.description: 1 or 2 or 3. Use monoexponential (1, default, required for single-shell) or multiexponential (2, multi-shell) model.

inputs.name: N fibres
inputs.description: A long integer >= 1. Maximum number of fibres to fit in each voxel.

inputs.name: N jumps
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Num of jumps to be made by mcmc.

inputs.name: No ard
inputs.description: A boolean. Turn ard off on all fibres.

inputs.name: No spat
inputs.description: A boolean. Initialise with tensor, not spatially.

inputs.name: Non linear
inputs.description: A boolean. Initialise with nonlinear fitting.

inputs.name: Out dir
inputs.description: A directory name. Output directory.

inputs.name: Rician
inputs.description: A boolean. Use rician noise modeling.

inputs.name: Sample every
inputs.description: A long integer >= 0. Num of jumps for each sample (mcmc).

inputs.name: Seed
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Seed for pseudo random number generator.

inputs.name: Update proposal every
inputs.description: A long integer >= 1. Num of jumps for each update to the proposal density std (mcmc).

inputs.name: Use gpu
inputs.description: A boolean. Use the gpu version of bedpostx.

output-files.name: Dyads
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Mean of pdd distribution in vector form.

output-files.name: Dyads dispersion
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Dispersion.

output-files.name: Mean s0samples
output-files.description: An existing file name. Mean of distribution on t2wbaseline signal intensity s0.

output-files.name: Mean dsamples
output-files.description: An existing file name. Mean of distribution on diffusivity d.

output-files.name: Mean fsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Mean of distribution on f anisotropy.

output-files.name: Mean phsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Mean of distribution on phi.

output-files.name: Mean thsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Mean of distribution on theta.

output-files.name: Merged fsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Samples from the distribution on anisotropic volume fraction.

output-files.name: Merged phsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Samples from the distribution on phi.

output-files.name: Merged thsamples
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Samples from the distribution on theta.
